name: project Sheep
description:
Relive your childhood by using everyday objects to sculpt your imagination.

Walking through your school-building you find an old and dusted overhead projector, the chalk stains reminding you of a sheep. Suddenly it happens, your imagination runs wild and you envision  the adventures of the sheep, helping it by using your student utensils. 

Control the hand to place items on the overhead projector and help the projected sheep on the wall reach its goal. 

Controls:

E: Projector View (tab to leave again)

In Projector View:

Q: Lower Hand THEN

Left Mouse: Point to push objects OR

Right mouse button: Grab/Release

Movement: WASD

Look: Mouse

Space: Projection View (tab to leave again)
